caption: Interactive 3D model of diagnostics menu, access to gfci test, fault log and system information via the media screen.

actionMsg.message:
Displays various system information about the hot tub.
This information is helpful when servicing the hot tub.
actionMsg.title: System Information

actionMsg.message:
Displays any faults detected by the hot tub.
It will store up to 50 fault settings.
actionMsg.title: Fault Log

actionMsg.message:
Click here to start the GFCI Test breaker.
The result will return either a pass or fail message.
actionMsg.title: GFCI Test Button

caption: Interactive 3D model of setting panel timeout via the media screen.

actionMsg.message: Swipe Up Again to access the next page.

Panel Timeout Menu
Scroll through the column to select the number
of minutes before the panel goes to sleep.
Reverting to the last saved setting.
actionMsg.title: Canceled

actionMsg.message: Panel Timeout has been confirmed.
actionMsg.title: Confirmed

actionMsg.message:
Scroll through and select the number of minutes.
Once selected, tap the confirm button.
actionMsg.title: Minute Block

caption: Interactive 3D model of setting the language via the media screen.

actionMsg.message:
Language Menu
There are 10 languages to select from: English, French, Spanish,
German, Italian, Czech, Swedish, Norwegian, Finnish, and Polish.

To select a language, scroll through and select the language you want to display.

Language change canceled.
Reverting to the last saved setting.
actionMsg.title: Canceled

actionMsg.message: Language change confirmed.
actionMsg.title: Confirmed

actionMsg.message:
Scroll through and select the language you want to display.
Once selected, tap the confirm button.
actionMsg.title: Language Block

caption: Interactive 3D model of unlocking the spa via the media screen.

actionMsg.message: Select one of the locked features.

Lock Menu
To unlock the feature scroll through each column to select a number.
Then move to the next number until a four-digit code has been entered.
Once you have your full pin entered, click confirm to unlock the feature.

Note: A default passcode can be used in case the original
passcode is lost or forgotten. The code "0772" will unlock the locked setting.

Cancelling the unlocking process.
Going back to the Locks Menu.
actionMsg.title: Cancel Button

actionMsg.message: If pin code is entered correctly, this unlocks the feature.
actionMsg.title: Confirm Button

actionMsg.message:
Scroll through each column to select a number.
Then move on to the next number until a four-digit code has been selected.
actionMsg.title: Number Block

caption: Interactive 3D model of controlling temperature settings via the media screen.

actionMsg.message:
Increasing the temperature
Note: The temperature range for the spa is 65 to 104F (18.33 to 40).
To activate the Extended Temperature feature that allows the spa to reach 106F (41C),
increase the temperature to 104F hold the up button for about 3 seconds.

Decreasing the temperature
Note: The temperature range for the spa is 65 to 104F (18.33 to 40).

caption: Interactive 3D model of controlling jet pumps via the media screen.
suggestedLabel: Jet Pump And Blower Controls in 3D

actionMsg.title: Jet 1
actionMsg.message:
Jet pumps are now turned on/off.
Note: Anytime a pump has been manually turned on,
it will automatically turn off after approximately 20 minutes.

If at this time you desire more jet operation you may
simply turn the pump(s) back on.

actionMsg.title: Jet 2
actionMsg.message:
Jet pumps 2 are now turned on/off.
Note: Anytime a pump has been manually turned on,
it will automatically turn off after approximately 20 minutes.

If at this time you desire more jet operation you may
simply turn the pump(s) back on.

actionMsg.title: Jet 3
actionMsg.message:
Jet pumps 3 are now turned on/off.
Note: Anytime a pump has been manually turned on,
it will automatically turn off after approximately 20 minutes.

If at this time you desire more jet operation you may
simply turn the pump(s) back on.

actionMsg.title: Air Injection
actionMsg.message:
Blower are now turned on/off.
The air blower forces air through the injectors and Focus-Relief Jets.
The blower automatically turns off after 20 minutes.
The jets might draw some air even though the blower is off.

The blower automatically turns off after 20 minutes.

simply turn the pump(s) back on.

caption: Interactive 3D model of controlling light settings via the media screen.

actionMsg.title: Interior Light
actionMsg.message:
Press to activate the interior lights.
The lights will default to the last setting used at a 100% intensity.

actionMsg.title: Exterior Light
actionMsg.message:
The exterior corner lighting has 2 settings. The lights display a solid White color only.
By continually tapping the button you will scroll through the following:
Press once - exterior lights are on at high intensity.
Press again - exterior lights are on a timer. On at 7PM and off at 12AM every day.
Press 3 times - turn off.
Decreasing light intensity. Minimum is 0
Increasing light intensity. Maximum is 5

actionMsg.title: Speed Control
actionMsg.message:
Controls the blending speed for the lights.
The range is from off to x5.
Tap to increase or decrease the blending speed of the colors.

actionMsg.title: Color Selector
actionMsg.message: Tap one of the buttons on the color wheel to select a single color.

caption: Interactive 3D model of controlling music settings via the media screen.

actionMsg.title: Power Button
actionMsg.message:
Tap to power the stereo on or off.
Settings only appear once power is on.

actionMsg.title: Rewind
actionMsg.message: Tap to move back through tracks.

actionMsg.title: Forward
actionMsg.message: Tap to advance forward through tracks.

actionMsg.title: Pause/Play
actionMsg.message: Tap to pause and play tracks.
Allows a Bluetooth device to be connected to the stereo. Tap the icon to switch between Auxiliary and Bluetooth modes.
Decreasing the volume.
Increasing the volume.

actionMsg.title: Decrease Bass
actionMsg.message: Tap the bass decrease button to decrease the bass.

actionMsg.title: Increase Bass
actionMsg.message: Tap the bass increase button to increase the bass.

actionMsg.title: Decrease Treble
actionMsg.message: Tap the treble decrease button to decrease the treble.

actionMsg.title: Increase Treble
actionMsg.message: Tap the treble increase button to increase the treble.
Tap to activate the Rock, Pop or Classical preset audio settings.

caption: Interactive 3D model of controlling the ClearRay on Demand feature via the media screen.

actionMsg.message:
The ClearRay on demand feature activates the water purification system.
Continuously tap this button to activate the system for 1 hour, 2 hours, 3 hours or OFF.
During this time the circulation pump and the ClearRay Active Oxygen system are on.

Note: When the ClearRay Active Oxygen system is on due to a
programmed or scheduled setting the feature cannot be turned off.
actionMsg.title: ClearRay on Demand

caption: Interactive 3D model of setting the heating mode via the media screen.

actionMsg.message:
Heat Settings
Here you can change the heat mode (Auto/Economy/Day)
or the temperature range (High/Low)

Switching between High/Low Temperature Mode

High Range Temperature (default setting)
The high range temperature can be set between 80F (26.5C) and
104F (40C). When the spa is in this setting it will display this icon
on the upper left corner of the control panel. The hot tub cannot be
set to a temperature below 80F (26.5).

Low Range Temperature
The low range temperature can be set between 65F (18.5) and
99F (37C). When the spa is in this setting it will display this icon
on the upper left corner of the control panel. The hot tub cannot
be set to a temperature above 99F (37).
Reverting to the last saved settings.
actionMsg.title: Cancelling changes

actionMsg.message: Your selection is saved.
actionMsg.title: Confirming selection

actionMsg.message:
Switching to Economy Mode
This is an energy saving heating program that
allows the spa to heat during non-peak hours.

When programmed to Economy, the spa will only be allowed to heat the water
between 5:00 PM to 7:00 AM every day. The hours cannot be adjusted.
Reverting to the last saved settings.
actionMsg.title: Cancelling changes

actionMsg.message: Your selection is saved.
actionMsg.title: Confirming selection

actionMsg.message:
Switching to Auto Mode
When programmed to Auto, the spa will maintain the water temperature
to the set temperature.
Heating will occur when necessary.

Switching to Day Mode
When programmed to Day, the spa will only be allowed to heat
the water between 7:00 AM to 5:00 PM every day.
The hours cannot be adjusted.
Reverting to the last saved settings.
actionMsg.title: Cancelling changes

actionMsg.message: Your selection is saved.
actionMsg.title: Confirming selection

actionMsg.message:
Switching to Economy Mode
This is an energy saving heating program that
allows the spa to heat during non-peak hours.

When programmed to Economy, the spa will only be allowed to heat the water
between 5:00 PM to 7:00 AM every day. The hours cannot be adjusted.
Reverting to the last saved settings.
actionMsg.title: Cancelling changes

actionMsg.message: Your selection is saved.
actionMsg.title: Confirming selection

actionMsg.message:
Switching to Auto Mode
When programmed to Auto, the spa will maintain the water temperature
to the set temperature.
Heating will occur when necessary.

Switching to Day Mode
When programmed to Day, the spa will only be allowed to heat
the water between 7:00 AM to 5:00 PM every day.
The hours cannot be adjusted.
Reverting to the last saved settings.
actionMsg.title: Cancelling changes

actionMsg.message: Your selection is saved.
actionMsg.title: Confirming selection

actionMsg.message:
Switching to Economy Mode
This is an energy saving heating program that
allows the spa to heat during non-peak hours.

When programmed to Economy, the spa will only be allowed to heat the water
between 5:00 PM to 7:00 AM every day. The hours cannot be adjusted.

caption: Interactive 3D model of setting the heating mode via the media screen.

actionMsg.message:
Heat Settings
Here you can change the heat mode (Auto/Economy/Day)
or the temperature range (High/Low)

Switching between High/Low Temperature Mode

High Range Temperature (default setting)
The high range temperature can be set between 80F (26.5C) and
104F (40C). When the spa is in this setting it will display this icon
on the upper left corner of the control panel. The hot tub cannot be
set to a temperature below 80F (26.5).

Low Range Temperature
The low range temperature can be set between 65F (18.5) and
99F (37C). When the spa is in this setting it will display this icon
on the upper left corner of the control panel. The hot tub cannot
be set to a temperature above 99F (37).
Reverting to the last saved settings.

caption: Interactive 3D model of setting primary and secondary filtration via the media screen.

actionMsg.message:
Primary Filtration
During a primary filtration, the circulation pump and the ClearRay Active Oxygen
system are activated. The factory default cycle starts at 12:00 AM and last for 8 hours.

Secondary Filtration Menu
By default secondary filtration is set to Away Mode.
This disables the Secondary Filtration.

Cancelling changes
Reverting to the last saved setting.

Confirming changes
Your changes are now saved.

Scroll through the hour block to change the hour in 1-hour increments.
You cannot adjust the minutes column.
actionMsg.title: Hour Block

actionMsg.message:
To select AM or PM, you will need to round a 12-hour period.
This will automatically adjust based on your selected hour.

actionMsg.message:
ClearRay UV Bulb Timer
The CearRay UV Bulb Timer has a life expectancy of 1 year.
A timer activates when power is applied and begins a countdown starting at 365 days.

Once the timer expires, a reminder message will appear on the display,
the UV bulb must be replaced and the timer needs to be reset.

Water Refresh Menu
A programmable Water Refresh reminder
can be set to remind you when to drain and refill the spa.

MicroClean Outer Menu
A programmable filter timer can be set to remind
you when to clean or replace the filters.

MicroClean Inner Menu
A programmable filter timer can be set to remind
you when to replace the MicroClean Inner Filter.
Reverting to the last saved settings.
actionMsg.title: Cancel Changes

actionMsg.message: Confirming the changes.
actionMsg.title: Confirm Button

actionMsg.message:
Scroll through the column to change the days in 10-day increments.
The range is from OFF (---) to 365 days.

In order to continually have the ClearRay system effectively perform
its function, it should be program as instructed.

caption: Interactive 3D model of locking the spa via the media screen.

actionMsg.message:
Settings Lock
Lock the settings and all its functions.
Scroll through each column to select a number.
Then move on to the next number until a four-digit code has been selected.
Once pin code is entered, click confirm button to lock the settings.

Access Lock
Lock all activation and adjustment features.
Scroll through each column to select a number.
Then move on to the next number until a four-digit code has been selected.
Once pin code is entered, click confirm button to lock the access features.

Maintenance Lock
All spa functions are locked to allow
for a temporary service mode such as filter cleaning.

Scroll through each column to select a number.
Then move on to the next number until a four-digit code has been selected.
Once pin code is entered, click confirm button to lock all functions.
Reverting to the last saved version.
actionMsg.title: Cancel Button

actionMsg.message:
The Settings Menu and all it functions are now disabled,
but the spa will still perform all scheduled tasks.
actionMsg.title: Confirm Button

actionMsg.message:
Scroll through each column to select a number.
Then move on to the next number until a four-digit code has been selected.
actionMsg.title: Number Block

actionMsg.message: Reverting to the last saved version.
actionMsg.title: Cancel Button

actionMsg.message:
All activation and adjustment features are disabled
but the spa will still perform all scheduled tasks.
actionMsg.title: Confirm Button

actionMsg.message:
Scroll through each column to select a number.
Then move on to the next number until a four-digit code has been selected.
actionMsg.title: Number Block

actionMsg.message: Reverting to the last saved version.
actionMsg.title: Cancel Button

actionMsg.message:
All spa functions are locked to allow for a temporary service mode such as filter cleaning.

Note: This mode has a time out of 2 hours.
The spa should not be left in this lock mode for an extended period.
Especially in colder climate or when freezing conditions exist.
actionMsg.title: Confirm Button

actionMsg.message:
Scroll through each column to select a number.
Then move on to the next number until a four-digit code has been selected.
actionMsg.title: Number Block
